snippet: A study published in The Lancet found that women experienced “unacceptably high” failure rates with the technique used instead of traditional hip implants. Some men were also affected.
abstract: Study in The Lancet urges women to avoid an alternative hip replacement procedure known as 'resurfacing' and also recommends against its use in smaller men; says women experience unacceptably high failure rates with the technique compared to traditional hip implants.
lead_paragraph: A study published in The Lancet found that women experienced “unacceptably high” failure rates with the technique used instead of traditional hip implants. Some men were also affected.

headline.seo: Hip Resurfacing Draws Warning After Study Published in Lancet
headline.main: Warning Issued on Alternative Hip Replacement Procedure
headline.print_headline: Warning About Alternative Hip Implant Procedure
